master.classes

Class MasterScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • master.classes.MasterScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HangerScreen, LoginScreen, MainMenu, MainMenuController, MasterGameScreen, MatchStatsScreen, RegistrationScreen, UserQueryController

    public class MasterScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    The master screen class contains the elements that all screens in Battle For The Galaxy share.

      • MasterScreen

        public MasterScreen(java.lang.String picture,
                    java.lang.String skin)
             throws java.net.UnknownHostException
        The master screen constructor that all game screens share
        Parameters:
        picture - The background picture the screen will have
        skin - The file containing default values for various items such as font, text buttons, labels, etc...
        Throws:
        java.net.UnknownHostException
